description: The interview process heats up when Park Wiley shows Tony Mecelli just how far he's willing to go to get the job. Mecelli opens the fly on his dress pants to reveal an anaconda looking for some sloppy head. Wiley provides some amazing deep throat action, taking all 10+ inches to the huge nutsack. Mecelli opens Wiley's belt and rips his pants off, bends him over the conference room table and fucks him deep. From there Mecelli puts Wiley on all fours and fucks him like a dog, pounding his fat ass untiil he pulls out and dumps his load all over Wiley's expensive blue dress shirt. Wiley follows suit, bringing the interview to an end.
title: Head Hunters 1
